sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { IoAirplaneSharp } from 'react-icons/io5' import { FlightData } from '../../models/FlightData' import { parseISO, differenceInMinutes, formatDistance } from 'date-fns'; type FlightProps = { flight: FlightData } const InfoFlight: React.FC = ({flight}) => { return (
6h 27m elapsed
3,280 mi flown
5h 55m remaining
3,204 mi to go
) } export default InfoFlight
